segments.text: I'm increasingly worried about that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretched out, reaching for those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks so wobbly; its legs are splayed outward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it's tilted backward, and it looks like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a truly dangerous position for him to be in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is pounding a little just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear he's going to lose his balance and come tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could hurt himself quite badly on that hard kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with the floor already wet from the overflowing sink, a fall would be even more hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to him?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry that such a clear danger is being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, oblivious to the imminent peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me feel incredibly uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
